description: These Healthy Breakfast Cookies are all super easy to make and great for an easy breakfast or healthy afternoon snack!
name: Healthy Make Ahead Breakfast Cookies
recipeIngredient: 2 1/2 cups old fashioned oats, gluten free certified if necessary
3/4 cups flour, gluten free or all purpose
1/2 cup + 1 tablespoon non-dairy milk (I like almond)
1 flax egg (1 Tbsp ground flax mixed with 2 1/2 Tbsp water, let sit for a few minutes)
1/2 cup dried blueberries (you could also use fresh)
1/3 cup chocolate chips (I used mini non-dairy ones)
1/2 cup dried cherries (You can also use fresh)

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat oven to 350 degrees F and line a large baking sheet with parchment paper.
Add all dry ingredients to a large bowl and stir. Next, add all remaining ingredients and mix again until everything is combined.
Use a 1/4 cup scoop to scoop the batter onto the parchment paper. Pat the tops down a little and bake cookies for 15-17 minutes, until firm and cooked through. Let cool on a wire rack before eating.

video.description: These Healthy Make Ahead Breakfast Cookies are easy to make, freezer friendly and great for a portable, on the go breakfast!  They're all gluten free, vegan and refined sugar free!  There's also 6 delicious flavors so you never get bored!  Recipe:https://www.shelikesfood.com/1/post/2017/07/healthy-make-ahead-breakfast-cookies-6-ways-2.html
video.name: Healthy Make Ahead Breakfast Cookies - 6 Ways
